onenote_auth.title: OneNote Authentication
onenote_auth.description:
To import your meal plans from OneNote, you need to authenticate.

1. Open a terminal on your Home Assistant server
2. Run: `python -m src.importers.onenote auth`
3. Follow the device code authentication flow
4. Return here and click Submit when done

Alternatively, you can skip this step and authenticate later.

notebook_selection.title: Select Notebooks
notebook_selection.description:
Select which OneNote notebooks contain your meal plans.

You can select multiple notebooks. Leave empty to skip import.

profile_generation.title: Generate Profile
profile_generation.description:
The final step will analyze your imported meals and generate a preference profile.

This helps the AI learn your cooking preferences, favorite ingredients, and meal patterns.

Click Submit to generate your profile.
